sourcesContent:
import React, {useState} from 'react'; import {Tab, Nav, Button} from "react-bootstrap"; import Conversations from "./Conversations"; import Contacts from "./Contacts"; const CONVERSATIONS_KEY = 'conversations' const CONTACTS_KEY = 'contacts' function Sidebar({id}) { const [activeKey, setActiveKey] = useState(CONVERSATIONS_KEY) const conversationsOpen = activeKey === CONVERSATIONS_KEY // Boolean constant of if activeKey is ConversationKey return (
Conversations Contacts
Your Id: {id}
); } export default Sidebar;
